name: Titanium.XML.NamedNodeMap
summary: A key-value paired map that maps String objects to Titanium.XML.Node objects. Implements the DOM Level 2 API on Android and iOS.

parameters.name: name
parameters.summary: The name of the node to retrieve.

returns.summary: The specified node, or null if no node with the name is in the map

methods.name: getNamedItemNS
methods.summary: Retrieves a node specified by name and namespace. Returns null if no matching node is in the map.

parameters.name: namespaceURI
parameters.summary: The namespace URI of the node to retrieve.

parameters.name: localName
parameters.summary: The local name of the node within the namespace to retrieve.

returns.summary: The specified node, or null if there is no matching node.

methods.name: item
methods.summary: Retrieves the node at the specified index of the map. Note that NamedNodeMaps are not ordered.

parameters.name: index
parameters.summary: The index of the node to retrieve.

returns.summary: The node at the specified index, or null if the index is invalid

methods.name: removeNamedItem
methods.summary: Removes a node from the map specified by name. When this map contains attributes attached to an element, if the removed attribtue is known to have a default, it is replaced with that value.

parameters.name: name
parameters.summary: The name of the node to remove.

returns.summary: The node removed from the map, or null if nothing removed.

methods.name: removeNamedItemNS
methods.summary: Removes a node from the map specified by local name and namespace URI. When this map contains attributes attached to an element, if the removed attribtue is known to have a default, it is replaced with that value. Returns the node removed from the map, or null if there is no corresponding node.

parameters.name: namespaceURI
parameters.summary: The namespace URI of the node to remove.

parameters.name: localName
parameters.summary: The local name of the node within the namespace to remove.

returns.summary: The node removed from the map, or null if nothing removed.

methods.name: setNamedItem
methods.summary: Adds a node using its nodeName attribute. If a node with that name is already present, it is replaced. Throws an exception if the argument is from a different document, the map is read-only, or the argument is an attribute of another element.

parameters.name: node
parameters.summary: The node to insert into the map.

returns.summary: The node replaced, or null if no node was replaced.

methods.name: setNamedItemNS
methods.summary: Adds a node using its namespaceURI and localName attributes. If a node with that name is already present, it is replaced. Throws an exception if the argument is from a different document, the map is read-only, or the argument is an attribute of another element.

parameters.name: node
parameters.summary: The node to insert into the map.

properties.name: length
properties.summary: The number of nodes in the map. The valid range of child node indices is 0-length-1, inclusive.
